Investing Blog Roundup: Happy New Year 2025

I hope you’ve all enjoyed your holiday season, and I wish you the best for 2025!

This week’s first article is an instant classic, in the category of “if somebody is trying to sell you something that seems to good to be true, it’s probably not true.”

Recommended Reading

  • Rich People Buying Tribal Tax Credits, Which The Treasury Dept Says Don’t Exist from Erin Schilling
  • Sharing Lessons from Jonathan Clements
  • When a Crystal Ball Isn’t Enough to Make You Rich from Victor Haghani and James White
  • What’s a Safe Retirement Spending Rate for 2025? from Christine Benz and Tao Guo
  • “The Intelligent Investor” Editor Shares the Classic’s Timeless Wisdom (Consuelo Mack discussion with Jason Zweig)
  • Home Ownership Isn’t for Everyone from Ben Carlson

Thanks for reading!
